titleStmt.title: The Resolution of the Protestant gentry and commonalty of Cheshire concerning their petition lately presented to the Kings Majesty at Yorke. Wherein is declared their loyalty to his sacred Majestie, and due obedience to the honourable Houses of Parliament. With all their protestation to spend their lives and estates to defend his sacred Majesty from all dangers, either forteigne [sic] or domesticke. And also to defend the Parliament against all opposers, declaring their great confidence, that their councels and determinations tend to the advancement of his Majesties honour and the preservation of all his loving subjects

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
